		            Treatment Options for Extragonadal Germ Cell Tumors
		            
		                
		                    Benign Teratoma
		                    Treatment of benign teratomas is surgery.    Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with benign teratoma. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such a
